Johanna.name: Punish
Johanna.description: Step forward dealing 113 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies by 60% decaying over 2 seconds.

Johanna.name: Condemn
Johanna.description: After 1 second, Johanna pulls nearby enemies toward her, Stunning them for 0.25 seconds and dealing 55 (+4% per level) damage. Deals 200% increased damage to Minions and Mercenaries.

Johanna.name: Shield Glare
Johanna.description: Deal 59 damage to enemies and Blind them for 1.5 seconds.

Johanna.name: Falling Sword
Johanna.description: Johanna leaps into the air for 2 seconds and she can steer the landing location by moving. While in the air, allies below Johanna are Unstoppable. Upon landing enemies hit take 225 (+4% per level) damage and are Stunned for 0.25 seconds.

Johanna.name: Blessed Shield
Johanna.description: Deal 114 (+4% per level) damage and Stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 57 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

Johanna.name: Iron Skin
Johanna.description: Activate to grant Johanna a Shield that absorbs 810 (+4% per level) damage for 4 seconds. While this Shield is active, Johanna is Unstoppable.

1.name: Divine Fortress
1.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant 8 Physical Armor for 2.5 seconds, stacking up to 40.  Gambit: Gain 20% bonus maximum Health. Every death reduces this bonus by 5%

1.name: Laws of Hope
1.description: Activate to heal 20% of Johanna's max Health over 5 seconds.  Quest: Every 10 Regeneration Globes gathered increases this heal amount by 5% of Johanna's max Health.

4.name: Subdue
4.description: Hitting 2 or more Heroes at the same time with Punish increases the Slow to 80% and the Slow amount does not decay.  Quest: Hit 4 or more Heroes at the same time with Punish.  Reward: Punish always Slows by 80%.

4.name: Eternal Retaliation
4.description: Mark enemies hit by Condemn for 10 seconds. Johanna's next Basic Attack against them removes the mark, lowering the cooldown of Condemn by 1 second, refunding 10 Mana, and killing Minions.

4.name: Hold Your Ground
4.description: Increases Iron Skin's Shield by 40% and its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

7.name: Sins Exposed
7.description: Punish reduces healing received by 35% for 2 seconds. Basic Attacks against them refresh this duration.

7.name: Conviction
7.description: Gain 10% Movement Speed, increased to 20% while Condemn is charging up.

7.name: Steed Charge
7.description: Activate to instantly Mount for 3 seconds, unhindered by damage.  Passive: Increase the duration of Iron Skin by 1 second.

10.name: Falling Sword
10.description: Johanna leaps into the air for 2 seconds and she can steer the landing location by moving. While in the air, allies below Johanna are Unstoppable. Upon landing enemies hit take 225 (+4% per level) damage and are Stunned for 0.25 seconds.

10.name: Blessed Shield
10.description: Deal 114 (+4% per level) damage and Stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 57 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

13.name: Roar
13.description: Increase Punish's damage by 25%. This bonus is increased to 150% whenever Punish hits 2 or more Heroes.

13.name: Holy Fury
13.description: Deal 15 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Each Hero hit by Condemn increases this damage by 40% for 5 seconds.

13.name: Blessed Hammer
13.description: Activate to create 2 hammers that spiral outward from Johanna, dealing 74 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit. Damaging enemies with Basic Abilities reduce the cooldown of this Ability by 3 seconds.  Passive: Every 3rd Basic Attack against enemy Heroes releases a hammer.

16.name: Shrinking Vacuum
16.description: Condemn reduces enemy Heroes damage by 25% and Slows by 25% for 2 seconds.

16.name: Holy Renewal
16.description: Hitting enemy Heroes with Shield Glare reduce its cooldown by 1.5 seconds and heals for 5% of Johanna's maximum Health.

16.name: Blessed Momentum
16.description: Basic Attacks grant 10% increased Attack Speed for 4 seconds, stacking up to 40%. They also reduce Johanna's Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Heaven's Fury
20.description: Falling Sword rains down holy bolts, dealing 75 (+4% per level) damage to enemies, healing allied Heroes for 75 (+4% per level), and reducing its cooldown by 2 seconds for each Hero hit.

20.name: Radiating Faith
20.description: Increase the number of enemies hit by Blessed Shield by 2. Its Stun duration is increased to 1.75 seconds and all targets hit are Stunned for the maximum duration.

20.name: Indestructible
20.description: Upon taking fatal damage, Johanna gains a Shield equal to her maximum Health for 4 seconds. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.

20.name: Blinded By The Light
20.description: Activate to grant nearby allied Heroes a Shield equal to 25% of their maximum Health for 3 seconds.  Hitting Heroes with Shield Glare reduces the cooldown of this Ability by 8 seconds.
